overview: Matt McAllister has more than 15 years of agency and in-house experience running successful marketing programs for a number of top Internet and technology companies. Most recently, Matt ran all of marketing for Tapjoy, the leader in monetization and distribution services for social games and applications. Prior to that he headed up the marketing departments for a number of other startup companies ranging from real estate news sites to online advertising agencies. He started his career as an account executive for Niehaus Ryan Wong, one of the top PR agencies in Silicon Valley during the early days of the dot.com era. Matt lives in Berkeley, California, with his wife, two daughters and two dogs, and in his spare time he enjoys playing soccer, golfing, reading and even a little yard work every once in a while.
